snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel engaged in secret peace treaty discussions with Syria in 2010, but the Arab Spring intervened, according to an Israeli involved in the talks.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, for several months in 2010, engaged in secret, American-brokered discussions with Syria for possible peace treaty based on full Israeli withdrawal from Golan Heights; process was cut short by Arab Spring uprisings that swept the Middle East in early 2011, soon spreading to Syria, and treaty did not come to fruition.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel engaged in secret peace treaty discussions with Syria in 2010, but the Arab Spring intervened, according to an Israeli involved in the talks.

headline.seo: Secret Israel-Syria Peace Talks Involved Golan Heights Exit
